Open education spotlight

View more

Resource Curation: Advancing EDI in Open Education

CCCOER Starting last autumn, CCCOER’s EDI Committee began developing a crowd-sourced list of open and freely available resources that advance EDI in teaching and learning through open educational resources (OER) and open education practices (OEP). Check it out and learn how you can contribute.

We <3 Sharing: We Like Sharing Open Photo Collection

OEWeek Organize your own version! We Like Sharing @ OEGlobal invites anyone to share a photograph from anywhere in the world that communicates a visual metaphor for the potential, benefits, characteristics of openly sharing.

Apply: Call for Proposals – host the OEGlobal Conference!

OEGlobal Conference The call for organisations to apply to host OEGlobal Annual Conference in 2025 or 2026 is now open. Read more!

  • OEG Board ViewsJanuary 10, 2024
    Open Education is a movement and a philosophy that seeks to eliminate barriers to learning and make education freely accessible to all. What … Read more
  • Celebrating Una Daly as she looks towards her “rewirement”December 28, 2023
    After 12 years of dedication to OE Global and specifically as the Director of CCCOER, Una Daly is embarking on a personal and well-earned “re-wiring” (Una’s term for it). Una Daly has directed the Community College Consortium for Open Educational Resources (CCCOER), since 2011. CCCOER is a regional Open Education Global (OEGlobal) hub that promotes open educational policies, practices, and resources.
  • OEGlobal 2023 Conference is certified CARBON NEUTRALDecember 20, 2023
    The Open Education Global 2023 conference is a carbon-neutral event. When planning our event, we made conscious choices to keep our emissions low. … Read more
  • OEGlobal 2023 : A Gift of Multiple PerspectivesDecember 14, 2023
    OEGlobal 2023 in Edmonton / Amiskwacîwâskahikan, Canada, took place in October 2023. There has been so much to digest and process from an exceptional conference. Here’s a recap through the eyes of the attendees.
